title: Number of assaults by weapon U.S. 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Weapon used in the x axis and Number of assaults in the y axis.
The Number of assaults is highest at Weapon used Other weapon and lowest at Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument.
Weapon used Other weapon has 1.82 times more Number of assaults than Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument which is has the lowest.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Weapon used in the x axis and Number of assaults in the y axis.
The Number of assaults is appeared to be the highest at Weapon used Other weapon and lowest at Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument.
Weapon used Firearm has the second highest value for Number of assaults.
The difference of Number of assaults between the highest and lowest Weapon used is 100744.0.

Weapon used Other weapon is higher than any other Weapon useds with value 223997.0, followed by Firearm, and Personal weapons. Down to Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument with the lowest value 123253.0.
The Weapon used Other weapon tends to be 1.26 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Weapon useds, we get total 711695.0.
